summary: Sprint 6 'Mastermind Calendar' Strategic Command Center testing complete. All features implemented and working correctly: two-pane layout (75% calendar + 25% pipeline sidebar), three view modes (Month/Agenda/Upcoming), DnD-ready pipeline cards, calendar events with detail sheets, AI suggestion Ghost Pills, month navigation, content filters, and sidebar navigation. Backend APIs (calendar, pipeline, suggest, schedule, unschedule) all passing.

issues: Ghost pills (AI suggestions) appear at the end of the month (25-28) - they work but could be more visible with better spacing/highlighting

passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/calendar - returns scheduled submissions with year/month filtering
Backend: GET /api/calendar/pipeline - returns unscheduled submissions (INTAKE/EDITING status)
Backend: GET /api/calendar/suggest - returns AI suggestions with gap analysis
Backend: PATCH /api/calendar/schedule/{id} - schedules submission to a date
Backend: PATCH /api/calendar/unschedule/{id} - moves submission back to pipeline
Backend: All auth checks working (401 for unauthorized)
Frontend: Two-pane layout displays correctly (calendar grid ~75%, pipeline sidebar ~25%)
Frontend: Month view shows calendar grid with weekday headers (Sun-Sat)
Frontend: 28 day cells rendered for February 2026
Frontend: Agenda view shows content grouped by date with status badges
Frontend: Upcoming view shows next 14 days with Today highlighting
Frontend: View toggle between Month/Agenda/Upcoming works correctly
Frontend: Content Pipeline sidebar shows 7 unscheduled submissions
Frontend: Pipeline cards have drag handles (GripVertical icon on hover)
Frontend: 7 calendar events displayed with content type and status badges
Frontend: 4 AI suggestion Ghost Pills displayed (dashed amber border)
Frontend: Clicking calendar event opens detail sheet
Frontend: Detail sheet shows: title, status, type, guest, description, release date, status change buttons, View Full Submission link
Frontend: Edit Release Date button works
Frontend: Unschedule button present in detail sheet
Frontend: 5 status change buttons (INTAKE, EDITING, DESIGN, SCHEDULED, PUBLISHED)
Frontend: Previous/Next month navigation works
Frontend: Content type filter dropdown works
Frontend: Status filter dropdown works
Frontend: Sidebar navigation still works correctly (no layout breaking)
critical_code_review_comments: Excellent implementation with @dnd-kit for drag-and-drop functionality
Good use of useDraggable/useDroppable hooks for DraggablePipelineCard, DraggableCalendarEvent, and DroppableDay
AI suggestions endpoint properly analyzes content gaps and recommends based on cadence watermarks
Cadence watermarks correctly set: Mon/Wed=SHORTS DAY, Tue/Thu=PODCAST DAY, Fri=BLOG DAY
DragOverlay provides good visual feedback during drag operations
Reschedule confirmation sheet is a nice UX touch for calendar-to-calendar moves
context_for_next_testing_agent: Sprint 6 Mastermind Calendar fully implemented. Key components: CalendarPage.jsx with DndContext, DraggablePipelineCard, DraggableCalendarEvent, DroppableDay, GhostPill for AI suggestions. Backend endpoints: /api/calendar (GET scheduled), /api/calendar/pipeline (GET unscheduled), /api/calendar/suggest (GET AI suggestions), /api/calendar/schedule/{id} (PATCH), /api/calendar/unschedule/{id} (PATCH). All using @dnd-kit/core for drag-and-drop.
